short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Copy selected TCO game stats into your data sheet

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Still using this extension?? Well, no need to! Get the same functionality in a bookmark! Works with every browser! https://ironchestgames.pythonanywhere.com/static/info/savetcogame.html

Tired of entering the data of each keyforge game you played on TCO into your spreadsheet? This extension makes that chore a little bit less of a chore!

Just press the copy button and the data will be copied to your clipboard. Then open your spread sheet and go to a new row and paste, tada! Low effort stats!
